from goumaijiezhang where shoujihao = #{shoujihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select from goumaijiezhang where 1=1
and shoujihao =#{shoujihao}

select from goumaijiezhang where 1=1 and shangpinbianhao like concat('%',#{shangpinbianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shangpinmingcheng like concat('%',#{shangpinmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and leibie like concat('%',#{leibie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and jiage like concat('%',#{jiage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and kucun like concat('%',#{kucun,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and goumaishuliang >= concat('',#{goumaishuliang1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and goumaishuliang <= concat('',#{goumaishuliang2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and goumaijine like concat('%',#{goumaijine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shoujihao like concat('%',#{shoujihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and yue like concat('%',#{yue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

id,
shangpinbianhao, shangpinmingcheng, leibie, jiage, kucun, goumaishuliang, goumaijine, xingming, shoujihao, yue,
